skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily messages
des: Kardec brought us the third revelation promised by Jesus. This skill contain messages that will be chosen especially for each moment of your life, you will find meaning in the words of Jesus that will help you overcome difficulties, and maybe make your jouney soft. You have friends up there.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
